title: Fix - MB version reqs and authmode

body:
Background: MB has disabled the email/pin auth method and raised the version reqs

Changes:
- Remove evcc token command line integration
- Remove unused code
- Change template docs
- Change minimum api version numbers

The auth/refresh token can be created with [some client side tooling](https://tinyurl.com/mbapi2020helptoken) - is used in the Home Assistant project too...

PS: I have explicitly not touched the identity.py stuff that was done by andig in #18412

errors.message: Could not resolve to an Issue with the number of 18412.
